Question.Subject: WINDOWS 7 keeps disconnecting internet?
Question.Content: i have a problem with windows7 . mt internet connection keeps disconnecting after 15 minutes how to remove this problem ? in this a box appear in which there is displayed that ur connection is idle u want to connect ? how to get rid of this?plzz help .. thanks
Question.ChosenAnswer: Normally, you can check the following settings. Click on internet option & under connection tab, click on setting after highlighting the connection name. Click on advanced & uncheck the box which says disconnect when connection may no longer be needed. Another way is to click on the connection icon in my network connections & click on properties. Under option tab, put " never" in the box which says idle time before hang up. I am sure you will find this information of some help to you.
